ayushmanBharatDesc: Provides health coverage of up to ₹5 lakh per family per year for secondary and tertiary care hospitalization.
nationalHealthDesc: Aims to provide accessible, affordable, and quality healthcare to rural and urban populations.
matruVandanaDesc: Provides financial assistance to pregnant and lactating women for their first living child.
jananiShishuDesc: Ensures free and cashless delivery, C-section, and postnatal care for pregnant women and sick newborns.
balSwasthyaDesc: Provides comprehensive healthcare services for children, including early detection of diseases.
missionIndradhanushDesc: Aims to immunize children and pregnant women against vaccine-preventable diseases.
surakshitMatritvaDesc: Provides free antenatal services to pregnant women on the 9th of every month.
nutritionMissionDesc: Aims to improve nutritional outcomes for children, pregnant women, and lactating mothers.
pmjayDesc: Provides health insurance coverage of up to ₹5 lakh per family per year for secondary and tertiary care hospitalization.
bplFamilies: Families living below the poverty line.
allCitizens: All citizens, especially women and children.
pregnantAndNewborn: All pregnant women and sick newborns.
nutritionBeneficiaries: Children, pregnant women, and lactating mothers.
